item.title: 3D Topology Explorer
item.description: Interactive 3D Surface Grapher. Visualize Paraboloids, Hyperboloids, Torus knots, and Spheres in real-time.

item.title: Linear Equation Grapher
item.description: Plot multiple linear equations (y=mx+b), find intersection points, and calculate x/y intercepts instantly with interactive graphs.

item.title: Polynomial Grapher
item.description: Plot and analyze Quadratic, Cubic, and Quartic functions. Automatically calculates vertex and roots for parabolas.

item.title: Australia Crypto Tax Calculator
item.description: Estimate your Capital Gains Tax (CGT) on cryptocurrency trades in Australia. Includes 2024-2025 tax brackets and the 50% long-term holding discount.

item.title: BMI Calculator
item.description: Check your Body Mass Index (BMI) instantly. Supports both Metric (cm/kg) and Imperial (ft/lbs) units with accurate health categories.

item.title: Investment Growth Calculator
item.description: Visualize the power of compound interest with monthly contributions. See how small savings grow into massive wealth over time.

item.title: Retirement Planning Calculator
item.description: Calculate the future value of your retirement savings with a crucial twist: see both your projected account balance AND its actual purchasing power after inflation.

item.title: ShadowStats Inflation Calculator
item.description: Compare Official US CPI inflation against the ShadowStats (1980-based) true inflation. See how much the methodology changes affect your wallet.

item.title: Survey Sample Size Calculator
item.description: Calculate exactly how many survey responses you need for statistically significant results. Supports finite population correction.

item.title: True Rating Calculator (Wilson Score)
item.description: Calculate the true statistical accuracy of a rating or conversion rate using the Wilson Score Interval.

item.title: Universal Percentage Calculator
item.description: The only percentage tool you need. Calculate percentage increases, find parts of a whole, and solve ‘X is what percent of Y’ problems instantly.
